The AP reported at the time: Mike Pence was the top choice for president with 24 percent of the vote. Former Arkansas Mike Huckabee , received 22 percent, followed by former Massachusetts Mike Huckabee Mitt Romney , former House Speaker Newt Gingrich and Palin.
